NO_OBJECT_DETECTED_COLOR

public static final Color NO_OBJECT_DETECTED_COLOR
When no color is detected by the Sensor, it's GetData() will return this constant

Constructor Detail

ColorSensor

public ColorSensor(Robot robot,
                   double pollingInterval,
                   double rotation)
Creates a Sensor that detects the color of the nearest PhysicsObject directly in front of it

Parameters:
robot - Robot the Sensor is attached to
pollingInterval - Time, in milliseconds, between updating the Sensor's data
rotation - Orientation of the Sensor relative to the Robot
